programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Forever In A Day
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E10, During a rescue of captured Abydonians, Daniel finds his missing wife, Sha're. But instead of greeting him, she attacks him - leading to her death at the hands of Teal'c. Distraught over her death and angry at Teal'c, Daniel quits Stargate Command.

programme.title: Past And Present
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E11, SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E13, When an alarm sounds, McKay suspects that a highly infectious disease has triggered the city’s self-protection system. With vital systems affected, the Atlantis team finds themselves trapped in various sections of the city with no way out.

programme.title: Harmony
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E14, Wanting to maintain diplomatic relations, Sheppard and McKay accompany Harmony, a precocious young princess, on a mandatory rite of passage. However, they are unaware that she has enemies, and character flaws, yet to be dealt with.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E15, When Lt. Colonel John Sheppard receives word that his father has passed away he returns to Earth. But once there, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous experiment gone awry—a human form Replicator now on the loose that must be recaptured at all cost.

programme.title: Trio
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E16, During an off-world mission in a village rocked by fierce tremors, Col. Samantha Carter, Dr. McKay, and Dr. Keller become trapped when they fall into a sinkhole. But every attempt to escape the confines of the chamber puts them in further jeopardy.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E17, The IOA has entrusted Mr. Coolidge, with interviewing Teyla Emmagan and Ronan Dex about their suitability to continue with the Atlantis expedition. Unbeknownst to anyone, a plan by the Wraith to invade the Midway station is about to be initiated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not right—the city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E04, The crew has been working throughout the night to try and determine why the ship’s power reserves are critically low. But when Destiny’s flight path towards a solar system reveals three planets, the entire crew hopes that one of them is habitable.

programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E22, A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a rescue on the Baywatch beach and realizes that a television series based on lifeguarding is perfect, sending Baywatch headquarters into a tizzy.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E01, After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch to place an underwater seismometer in the Malibu fault. Hobie has an argument with his father about his future.
